message: Hello Bob, I am offering this product for $14,000. I believe it will be very beneficial to you, and this is a fair price.
I appreciate your offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $12,000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Bob, I understand your position, but $12,000 is too low for me. How about we meet in the middle at $13,000?
I appreciate your willingness to meet in the middle, but I was thinking more along the lines of $11,500. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, I'm trying to be fair, but I need a bit more than that.  Would you consider $12,500? This is my final offer.
I understand that you've made a final offer, but I'm still not convinced that's the best price. I'm willing to meet you at $11,500. This is my final offer.
